name: confabulous
description: A pluggable, hierarchical, asynchronous config loader and post processor with support for environment variables, command line arguments, json, javascript, http, vault, etcd and postgres

scripts.example: cd examples && SECRET='a password' NODE_ENV=development node index.js
scripts.coverage: nyc --report html --reporter lcov --reporter text-summary node test --test-argument
scripts.codeclimate: (test -e .codeclimate && npm run coverage && source .codeclimate) || echo skipping codeclimate
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run codeclimate

author: GuideSmiths Ltd
